constituent: halt, person, pavilion, tall, top hat, mouth, crown, street, nail, spike
myStory: chữ đình. dừng lại, đình chỉ. nhân + đình(cái đình).
words: stagnation, tie-up, congestion, retention, accumulation, falling into arrears
suspension, interruption, stoppage, ban, standstill, deadlock, stalemate, abeyance
